main event: On 14 May 1952, four civilians observed an unidentified flying object in Malung Sawan, Sweden.
interesting points: The object was described as illuminated and similar in size to an aircraft., Civilians were driving when they spotted the object passing from northeast to southwest., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 seconds., No smoke or fire was observed during the sighting., Swedish Defense Staff considered the object as unidentified and did not receive any other reports.
sighted object: an illuminated object resembling an aircraft
